mapper.insert: insert into member(mem_name, mem_id, mem_pwd, mem_email, mem_birth, mem_phone, mem_joindate, mem_address, mem_img) values ( #{mem_name}, #{mem_id}, #{mem_pwd}, #{mem_email}, #{mem_birth}, #{mem_phone}, now(), #{mem_address}, #{mem_img} )
mapper.select: select mem_id, mem_name, mem_email, mem_birth, mem_phone, mem_address, mem_img from member where mem_id = #{mem_id}
mapper.update: update member set mem_name = #{mem_name}, mem_email = #{mem_email}, mem_birth = #{mem_birth}, mem_phone = #{mem_phone}, mem_address = #{mem_address}, mem_img = #{mem_img} where mem_id = #{mem_id}
